english.segment1: I deserve your wrath. I deserve the pain. I deserve your back. I deserve the humility.
english.segment2: O but Lord. Your grace. Your mercy. Your love. it saw me threw. even though I didn't desire U. (O U loved me anyways)
english.segment3: I deserve to die. but you gave me life. I deserve hell. But you gave me heaven. I deserve nothing. But you gave me all. Let me give it back. Let me love You when no one else does. Let me walk and hold Your hand. Let me tell You how much I Love You. O I love you.
